loot_odds_error_fail_to_load_description: Sorry, we were unable to retrieve loot item data. If this persists, please try restarting the League Client.
loot_odds_droprates_modal_legal_disclaim: Information about the probabilities relating to the content of your purchase
loot_odds_droprates_modal_additional_gua: Also contains one of the following:
loot_odds_droprates_modal_chance_subtitl: Chance to contain any of the following:
loot_odds_bad_luck_protection_descriptio: No bad luck for you. For certain rewards, opening a certain number of items without a specific reward will guarantee that reward on the next item. The reward and threshold are different for every item.
loot_odds_no_duplicates_description: One or more rewards will not drop an item you already own. Can drop an item one level higher if the item has tiers. All unowned items have a higher chance to drop.
